body:
i'm thankful to have had a very lazy saturday yesterday. i'm thankful to have read the most recent issue of _new york_ in the bath. i'm thankful that d not only made a chocolate cheesecake with an oreo crust, but she also [saved the leftover oreo creme](https://twitter.com/fakeirl/status/835602828756414464) for me because she knows i love it. i'm thankful in addition to [eating a slice of the delicious cheesecake](http://eat.at/swap/forum1/237099_REC__Milk_Chocolate_Cheesecake), i also made homemade mega stuffed oreos with the leftover creme. i'm thankful that though i ate too much dessert yesterday, i hadn't eaten dessert for most of last week, so maybe it wasn't so bad. i'm thankful for [this breathless endorsement of a fast food breakfast sandwich](https://twitter.com/Eater/status/835821732694994946), which both d and i want badly now.

i'm thankful for the album [_infinite worlds_ by vagabon](https://play.spotify.com/album/2t1IC3t3dXjK1wIlsEjCez?play=true&utm_source=open.spotify.com&utm_medium=open), which thrums with the electricity of the body. i'm thankful for the song "darling" by real estate, whose music always makes me feel like summer. i'm thankful for "[blessings](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XX2sbWON_J0)" by sampa the great and am always thankful for jazz-hop. i'm thankful for [this strange lovely little thing](https://twitter.com/fakeirl/status/835296776580128768) by gonzalez and jarvis cocker. i'm thankful for the new lana del rey song and for the gorgeous and moving video, [which makes a paradise out of the apocalypse](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3-NTv0CdFCk). i'm thankful that i had a dream where i got kicked out of the band because of my attempt to get our keyboard player to play in a certain way, but i'm thankful it was just a dream. i'm thankful for [this unicorn made of musical notes](https://twitter.com/andrewismusic/status/833851580906627078). i'm thankful for [this accurate representation of when drake hears a new flow](https://twitter.com/Astral4th/status/833400259686629377). i'm thankful for ["will smith" rapping over the credits of _arrival_](https://twitter.com/electrolemon/status/835652523868332032), which reminds me of my youth.

i'm thankful that courtney love did a recitation of sylvia plath's "daddy" when auditioning for _[the mickey mouse club](https://twitter.com/SylviaPlthQuots/status/835752260499976192)_ (i'm thankful for [sylvia plath's reading voice](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6hHjctqSBwM), which always freaks me the fuck out). i'm thankful for [this emotional moment from the wikipedia page for violent j of icp](https://twitter.com/ohevie/status/835560193069035520) (i'm thankful to have been reminded of "[american juggalo](https://www.amazon.com/American-Juggalo-Kindle-Single-Russell-ebook/dp/B005FYHO8W)" by kent russell). i'm thankful for [this pill](https://twitter.com/elizabethgum/status/833855154847940609), which both prevents ulcers and induces abortion, two activities i think are important. i'm thankful for [freaks on the internet](https://t.co/SWFqTUfAaE) and for [freaks on the internet](https://twitter.com/TriciaLockwood/status/833867823004921860). i'm thankful that we are all freaks on the internet, but some freaks are freakier than others. i'm thankful [to zoom into the dog's nose](https://twitter.com/TheIrwinEmpire/status/835628123295268864).
normalized_markdown:
i'm thankful to have had a very lazy saturday yesterday. i'm thankful to have read the most recent issue of _new york_ in the bath. i'm thankful that d not only made a chocolate cheesecake with an oreo crust, but she also [saved the leftover oreo creme](https://twitter.com/fakeirl/status/835602828756414464) for me because she knows i love it. i'm thankful in addition to [eating a slice of the delicious cheesecake](http://eat.at/swap/forum1/237099_REC__Milk_Chocolate_Cheesecake), i also made homemade mega stuffed oreos with the leftover creme. i'm thankful that though i ate too much dessert yesterday, i hadn't eaten dessert for most of last week, so maybe it wasn't so bad. i'm thankful for [this breathless endorsement of a fast food breakfast sandwich](https://twitter.com/Eater/status/835821732694994946), which both d and i want badly now.

i'm thankful for the album [_infinite worlds_ by vagabon](https://play.spotify.com/album/2t1IC3t3dXjK1wIlsEjCez?play=true&utm_source=open.spotify.com&utm_medium=open), which thrums with the electricity of the body. i'm thankful for the song "darling" by real estate, whose music always makes me feel like summer. i'm thankful for "[blessings](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XX2sbWON_J0)" by sampa the great and am always thankful for jazz-hop. i'm thankful for [this strange lovely little thing](https://twitter.com/fakeirl/status/835296776580128768) by gonzalez and jarvis cocker. i'm thankful for the new lana del rey song and for the gorgeous and moving video, [which makes a paradise out of the apocalypse](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3-NTv0CdFCk). i'm thankful that i had a dream where i got kicked out of the band because of my attempt to get our keyboard player to play in a certain way, but i'm thankful it was just a dream. i'm thankful for [this unicorn made of musical notes](https://twitter.com/andrewismusic/status/833851580906627078). i'm thankful for [this accurate representation of when drake hears a new flow](https://twitter.com/Astral4th/status/833400259686629377). i'm thankful for ["will smith" rapping over the credits of _arrival_](https://twitter.com/electrolemon/status/835652523868332032), which reminds me of my youth.

i'm thankful that courtney love did a recitation of sylvia plath's "daddy" when auditioning for _[the mickey mouse club](https://twitter.com/SylviaPlthQuots/status/835752260499976192)_ (i'm thankful for [sylvia plath's reading voice](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6hHjctqSBwM), which always freaks me the fuck out). i'm thankful for [this emotional moment from the wikipedia page for violent j of icp](https://twitter.com/ohevie/status/835560193069035520) (i'm thankful to have been reminded of "[american juggalo](https://www.amazon.com/American-Juggalo-Kindle-Single-Russell-ebook/dp/B005FYHO8W)" by kent russell). i'm thankful for [this pill](https://twitter.com/elizabethgum/status/833855154847940609), which both prevents ulcers and induces abortion, two activities i think are important. i'm thankful for [freaks on the internet](https://t.co/SWFqTUfAaE) and for [freaks on the internet](https://twitter.com/TriciaLockwood/status/833867823004921860). i'm thankful that we are all freaks on the internet, but some freaks are freakier than others. i'm thankful [to zoom into the dog's nose](https://twitter.com/TheIrwinEmpire/status/835628123295268864).
